name: Unity manifesto
uniques: [2] free [Opolchenets] units appear
Can only be built <in [Capital] cities>
Gain a free [Food Store] [in this city]
Automatically built in all cities where it is buildable
quote: This Manifesto will be sacred to all Free Cities. He will consolidate our Unity in the face of difficulties

civilopediaText.text: This Manifesto will be sacred to all Free Cities. He will consolidate our Unity in the face of difficulties

name: Opolchenie
uniques: Free [Opolchenets] appears
New [Military] units start with [15] XP [in this city]
Destroyed when the city is captured

name: Fortification
uniques: Only available <in cities with a [Walls]>
Destroyed when the city is captured
Creates a [Fort] improvement on a specific tile

name: Veche
uniques: [-25]% Culture cost of natural border growth [in this city]
[-25]% Gold cost of acquiring tiles [in this city]

name: Citywide Assembly
uniques: [+1 Gold, +1 Culture] per [4] population [in all cities]
[-15]% Unhappiness from [Population] [in all cities]
Only available <if [Search for Survivors] is constructed>
Can only be built <in [Capital] cities>
Only available <in cities without a [Unified Council]>
[+1 Culture] [in all cities connected to capital]
Destroyed when the city is captured

name: Unified Council
uniques: [+5]% Production when constructing [All] units [in all cities]
[+5]% Production when constructing [All] buildings [in this city]
[+10]% growth [in all cities]
Can only be built <in [Capital] cities>
Only available <in cities without a [Citywide Assembly]>
[+15]% Production when constructing [City Defense] buildings [in all cities]
Destroyed when the city is captured

name: Allea pamati
uniques: [+1 Culture] from [Books] tiles [in this city]
[+1 Faith] from [Artifacts] tiles [in this city]
[+1 Happiness, +1 Culture] [in this city] <after discovering [Social Engineering]>
Destroyed when the city is captured
